import React from 'react' import { BillContext } from '../Context/Bill' import { useContext } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from '../Context/UserContext' function HotelsChild(props) { let [bill,setbill]= useContext(BillContext) let [context,setContext] = useContext(UserContext) console.log(props.mode) let navigate = useNavigate() function confirmHotel(){ setbill(bill + props.data.pricePerNight) setContext(...context,{"hotelName":props.data.name}) navigate('/Places') } return (

{props.data.name}

{props.data.vehicleNumber}

) } export default HotelsChild
